text:
Bhai mai sach batata hu, CS640 ka vo paper mai AB TAK nahi samjha hu. Bhai tu jab midsem ke answers discuss karta tha, mai phone recording pe rakh deta tha, kyunki samajh me aani to hai nahi, kya pata baar baar recording chalaye to 10% samajh me aa jaye.
Genius is an understatement for you. Yet you are SO HUMBLE. And so straightforward. Project report ka draft padhke muh pe bol diye the tum ki "bhai bahut kharab likha hai". Loved the fact that you are so honest. No bullshit, straight to the point. Plus, you helped me so much ! CS640 me pehli baar samajh me aaya ki efficient group-work hota kya hai. You are a natural leader. You inspire me to work harder.
TA201 me mai raat bhar night-out maarke thakke aata tha, aur fraud hi maarta tha mai. But I was assured ki tum hoge, to sambhaal loge, aur mereko push karoge. ESC201 me jis jis din vo lab partner (mere se bada fraudi tha wo) aata nahi, us din tum mera partner bann jate the. Thanks yaar. 
I know for a fact that I'll hear about you even after you graduate. Touch me rehna. And, (not that I even need to say this) keep excelling in everything you do.
author: Alan  Nair

text:
BC if only I had a coin for every time you got kicked out of the wing group (ok technically I'll have 3 coins). You are the pinkest, deepest, wettest part of our wing group. Over the 3 (+1 online) years, I have seen you being penetrated by the collective love of the group. You've been up and you've been down. You've screamed, you've shouted. You gave us so much fun time.
Aage bhi aise hi selfies kheechiyo, aage bhi aise hi comments daaliyo whatsapp group me. Aur jab apna onlyfans kholega to mere liye free rakhiyo
author: Alan  Nair

text:
First of all thanks meri Hindi vocabulary double ki ha tumne. DramEve-2 ke sare hit gaane hum saath me hi to likhe the. Second year Antaragni ka safar bhi kitna sahi tha yaar. Us time pe Pata hi nahi tha ki eventually qualify/disqualify ya haar/jeet nahi balki keval wo night-outs, improvs, play-throughs yaad rahenge. You are a sutradhar to the core of your being. Stay true.
Love,
Alan.
author: Alan  Nair

text:
Its only in fourth year when I've been away from people for long that I begin to reflect on my interactions with them. And I wish ki kaash uss time kauch aisa kar liya hota, kaash uss time aise behave kar liya hota tha.
I'm sorry about all those jokes I made about your height. In retrospect I guess you weren't fond of them (nor were they very funny either). Regardless, I want to thank you, because you'll never know what a significant role you played in the drama of my life. I was a misogynist before I came to IITK and you are one of the women whose interactions with me changed me. I hope we meet again. Stay happy always :)
author: Alan  Nair

text:
Kuch logon ke dimaag me kuch screws loose hote hain. Tumhare me to hai hi nahi. Legit the craziest girl I know. You introduced me to the concept of "fun" in first year. Usse pehle to bahut hi fuddu tha mai (ab tu bolegi ki mai ab bhi fuddu hi hu - chal chal baap ko mat sikha). Yaad hai wo mime wali raat ? Kitna ganda kat gaya tha hum sab ka. Lekin phir cycle pe puri raat ghumte rahe, aur campus explore kiya. The first of many nightouts to come.
Stay wild, girl. Never settle. Your wilderness deserves a forest, not a garden.
author: Alan  Nair

text:
To all ladies reading this - here's a guy who can sing, play guitar, dance and make you laugh.
Le, aadha kaam maine kar dia. Baaki tu dekh.
Also, some shocking information: "Give me some sunshine" ke alawa bhi gaane hote hain.
author: Alan  Nair

text: BC Tinder bio yahaan kyu chhaap diya?
author: Alan  Nair

text:
When I first saw you in my wing, I was like OMG YE KITNA KEWWL HAI. He's from Delhi and hangs out with DU chix at Antaragni and all.

Ofc baad me pata chala ki tu campus ka sabse senti launda hai, aur Gaziabad is not in Delhi lol. 
Still, I think you're cool because you are honest with what you want. You don't lie to others anymore than to yourself. Hope you get less conflicted over time, and find true peace and (corny alert) true love.

Oh wait, tu toh ek aur saal rahega na yahaan? BC bekaar me senti baate kar di.
author: Alan  Nair

text: Bhai ! Ek to maaf kar de yaar, maine kitna mazaak udaya tera, par tu chupchap sunta raha. You are so patient, so tolerant. Tere saath baithke gaane likhne me majaa bahut aata tha. Aur beech beech me teri politics pe gyaan chodna bhi bahut entertaining tha. Loved all the Hall 12 - Hall 5 verbal fights during Galaxy nights. Loved it that night when you came to my room drunk from the Antaragni party. Loved each of those million moments. There would have been a million more, if not for this *unknown* virus of *unspecified* origin
author: Alan  Nair

text:
Yo IITK ka pehla online Cult Gensec !
Maine jitna fraud mara hai, utna sincerely kaam tune kiya hai bhai. Tu bhi dual kara liya lololol. Saath me wing lena hai, bhoolna mat.
author: Alan  Nair

text:
Ek hi advice hai, jo tujhe sab hi dete hain, anyways: BT KAM LIYA KAR!!!
Tu un logon me se hai, jo khushiyaan baattha hai, aur khud BT leta hai. Anyway, apne paas 1 saal aur hai na, to yaha  short and sweet rakhta hu:

Bro.
Tu maal hai.
author: Alan  Nair

text:
Bhaaaiiii !!! kuch log hai campus me jinse maal phunkwana mera target tha, par bc corona ne sare plans bigaad diye. Haan haan, sahi guess kiya, tu uss list me tha. BC ek saal aur hota to pakka succeed bhi hota plan.

Kitni baar DoSA ko gaali di hamne, aur phir bhi wo paise wapas mile nahi. Aur bc Cognitive thoda khud bhi dekh leta to A lata. Khair, ab grade se kya farak padhta hai, tu to ab Amazon me chaapega. Maal-waal ka jugaad karo bhai Amazon pe. Vendors ki kami thodi hai. Aur aa jaana kabhi-kabhi campus agle saal, jarur.
author: Alan  Nair

text:
Bhai...
Sirf tu hi hai, jispe memoir mai keval first year ke experience ke basis pe hi likh sakta hun. Mujhe yaad hai first year Orientation me when you introduced yourself to me. "Oyon" Bannerjee (you were my first exposure to Bengali accent - I was like dude why is talking like that).
In a campus full of people jo sirf nasha karna, cheating karna aur fraud maarna jaante the, tu akela banda tha jo sincere aur dedicated tha. I wish ki zyaada time bitaaya hota tere saath. How fast it went by! Anyway, this is not the end bro. We need to meet again. We will, 100%
author: Alan  Nair

text:
BC har raat tere room pe party hoti thi. Projector lagake ya to match, ya phir Hindi serial, aur wo dekhne pura C6 aa jata tha. Aur wo bhi corona ke time pe. Itni party to maine nahi ki hai bsdk, aur phir mujhse bolta hai nashe kam karne ko ? 
Aage jab campus aata hai to bataiyo. B208 me jo bhi launda hoga, use nikal denge aur wahaan projector lagake match dekh lenge. Is baar to mai bhi aaung saath me match dekhne.
author: Alan  Nair

text:
"Oye sunn. Terence McKenna sunte hai."
"കിളി പോയി"

Bruh I could say you changed my life, but that wouldn't be the whole truth. The changes go deeper than the layers which constitute "me". There were so many irrelevant things I stupidly clung to with my pig-headed rationalism until you took my hand and helped me leave them behind in those cleansing hot waters (you know which one). I still remember thinking "wtf is he talking about" when you first unleashed all that non-duality stuff on me. I would never even have seriously taken to watching films if it weren't for you. If I made a film of all the things we did, it would be more surreal than Lynch, more outrageous than Rivette, and more spiritual than Tarkovsky. Your imprint is all over me.

And, yeah, you are THE ARTIST, bro. And not all of your art is paint and sketches - one of those artworks is a living breathing computer nerd. And may I be brash for once to say, that you (as always) have made a MASTERPIECE.
author: Alan  Nair

text: B2 me consecutively 4 CSE wale rehte the, aur unme sirf 1 hai jo actually padhai karta tha, aur vo tha tu. Bihar topper ab B2 topper bann gaya. BC tumse phunkwana mera college life ka goal tha, par corona ke wajah se hua nahi. Ab to tum to graduate ho gaye, par mai ek saal aur rahunga campus me. Aa jana kabhi. Dekhte hain, kya hota hai *wink* *wink*
author: Alan  Nair

text:
Korea ka raja Kim Jong,
Gaane ko kehte hain song.
bas ek sawaal tha puchna tumse
kyun toda bsdk wo bong ?!
author: Alan  Nair

text:
Yo wssup Marilyn. This is yo favorite nigga here -Toby.
Wo English play mere liye bahut special tha. I took a break from Drams after that play and expanded into films. And as my understanding of art changed, its that play I kept falling back to and basing my understanding on.
You are sooo cool ! And mera deep wish hai ki graduate hone se pehle ek aur play karna hai with you and the rest of the gang (sab saath saath me Dual kar liye lolol coincidence ho to aisa - even God wants to watch another play from us).
Take care. Respect from Alan. Hugs and platonic kisses from Aleena.
author: Alan  Nair

text:
Yooo Roomie !!!!
Security deposit wapas mila phir ? LOL
Aur bc puri kahani Hall 2 me faila di XD. Deepanshu aake mujhse poocha ki bc kya kaand kar diye Gurgaon me.
Thanks for tolerating me for two months (actually 3 days less than that lol). Suna hai robotics me chaapu hai tu. Bakchod to tu hai hi. Touch me rehna bhai !
author: Alan  Nair

text:
Ye memoir likhne ka yehi dikkat hai ki kehne ko itna kuch hai, aur likhne ka jagah itna kam. First year ki mini militia battles se lekar fourth year ke aandhi me hall anthem battles tak me itna kuch beet gaya ki ab uske bare me 2 paragraph likhna to tum HSS walon se na ho payega, aur mai to bas ek chhota sa, nannha sa, mallu hun. Zindagi lambi ho ya na ho, badi to ho chuki hai tumse (aur B6 ke sare laundon se) milkar.

Ye agar tum 10-15 saal baad padh rahe ho, to ek baar mann-hi-mann gaao:
"वीर शिवा शमशीर मराठा
अनुपम नूतन संताने ..."
author: Alan  Nair

text: Bro... I sincerely hope ki you'll find happiness, and more importantly, peace. You are just too genuine and too pure for this world. Log Katiyar ko bolte hain BT kam lene ko, but legit you need this more. I don't know how, but one day you WILL find peace and equanimity. Then you will look back on the ups and downs in life like bright and dark brushtrokes on a painting, like high and low notes in a symphony. And you will love the lower notes just as much as the higher notes, because wo dono milke hi to pura gaana banta hain. And until that day comes, stay strong. We love you. Send a hi on fb every now and then: Ab to mere 1 nahi, 2 account hai - kisi pe bhi bhej dena.
author: Alan  Nair

text:
Einstein, Alan Watts and Bodhidharma rolled up into one hippie nigga.
In the little time I spend with you, I learnt so much! You are so pure, you are naturally inquisitive in a way I never was. Literally my whole routine for a long portion of time at IITK was wake up, go to D-401, get blazed. Anyway, screw all that - apan jaa thodi rahe hai. Milte hain this/next year with more stories, and a wider variety of molecules.
author: Alan  Nair

text:
bhai bhai bhai
kahaan se shuru karun ?
First year Galaxy ki story se ? Ya wo hospital wali raat ? Students Films Society ? Powercut wali raat ?
Bhai itne sare stories hai yaar, aur adhe to publically likh bhi nahi paunga.
Bas ek advice tere liye: jab "अध्यापक" lane jaata hai, to "हस्ताक्षर" mat laya kar !
author: Alan  Nair

text: On the night of April 2, 2021 in Hall 5 (yeah you know), I saw you on the phatta ground, holding a cycle and smoking a joint on the other hand. Idk why but that image has stuck to my memory. Maybe because it represents you so perfectly. You are a traveller - probably one of the wildest spirits I've met. You don't let the BT of life get you down, you'll face it fearlessly with a j in one hand. Never change, bro. And never settle down.
author: Alan  Nair

text:
Bhai !!
Tum nahi hote to 3rd year me SFS ke screenings kaun karata ? Mai yehi sochke chill maarta tha ki "nashe kar lo, chill maar lo, koi tension nahi hai kyunki Nipun sambhaal lega"
Drams me tum aur varun jo chaapte the na, sach me bahut gehra impression chhod gaya hai mujhpe. ki "yaar yehi hoti hai Creativity. Yehi hoti hai bakchodi". Aur ab to online me chaap rahe ho. 
Lets hope ki kam se kam 2022 offline ho. Culture tum hi bacha sakte ho. Mai to nashe hi karta rahunga, ye bhi tum hi sambhaal lena.
author: Alan  Nair

text: Bhai jab maine suna ki tune bhi dual kara li, mai literally hass pada. Kyunki ab campus aa gaye to entertainment ki koi kami nahi hogi. Us raat around Galaxy 2020 jab Hall-2 me aaye the (Loki ka bday i think), bhai tujhe teri harkatein yaad nahi honge, par baaki logon ke liye vo unforgettable the. Yaar, ye me kaise explain karu... IF DRAMATICS WAS A PERSON, HIS NAME WOULD BE NANA.
author: Alan  Nair

text:
Eyyyyyy!!!
First of all, I don't mind you haunting my dreams, just keep it entertaining as always. And yeah, go ahead make that music video, and write more songs. Recc me more anime. Above all, stay metal.
author: Alan  Nair

text:
Majaa aaya bhai.
Apna B2 wing mujhe first year wale wing se bhi zyada sexy lagta hai, aur uska one of the main reason tum hi ho. BC CSE walon ko lekar jo bhi stereotypes hai, sab tode hai tune (siwaay nashe ke - wo wala department mera raha hai). Bhai saath me quiz ke ek raat pehle night-outs bhi maare hain, mafia khelte khelte night outs bhi maare hain. Agle saar aa jaana campus kabhi. Yu hi. "Ghoomne".
author: Alan  Nair

text:
Bhai vo Rendezvous wali raat yaad hai jab Kedia ke saath pehli baar joint phunkaya tha XD
Tum hi launch kiye ho mujhe is industry me
Aur to aur jitna time saath me bitaya usme tum meri Hindi ki vocabulaty 2x kar gaye. Bahut maja aata tha tumhari shayari sunke sochne me ki bc iska matlab kya ho sakta hai. Aage ka kya hoga, kaise ho ga, kab hoga, iska pata nahi par bhai jo time mila na saath me, legit 100% tha <3 <3 <3
author: Alan  Nair

text:
Kitna sweet ladka hai yaar tu..? Cho chweet indeed
636 kaafi sahi jodi bani thi hamari. Aur extensions bhi apan dono ko hi maangna padta tha.
Hall 5 me mai full-time maal marne jata tha to tu raste  me dikh jata tha aur bolta tha "class hai 10 minute mai". Tere alawa aur koi banda nahi h campus me jo maal marne wale ko raste me rokkar padhai yaad dilata.
Innocent, dedicated and straightforward guy you are. Never change.
author: Alan  Nair

text:
Tu kaun hai bsdk ? Mai to Shubhita ke liye memoir likhne aaya tha.
BC offline me itna shareef banda aur online me itna harami koi kaise ho sakta hai ? ART105 yaad hai ? Nahi hoga yaad kyunki teeno assignment me bc fraud mara tha tu. Kam se kam wo blowback yaad hoga jo maine tujhe B202 me diya tha. Haan 50-60 logon ko bhi yaad hai jo zoom call pe dekh rahe the. Techkriti Standup ka moment of the day. 
Take care bro. Hugs and Kisses to Shubhita.
author: Alan  Nair

text:
I'll keep this short.
IAS jab tu banega, mai tere district me shift hoke khule aam nashe karunga.
Tu bacha liyo. 
*senti hugs and platonic kisses*
author: Alan  Nair

text:
Haan bsdk tereko aur lamba memoir chahiye na. BC lamba to bahut kar sakta hu, kyunki literally utna zyada content hai apne paas.
Bhai first year me literally sab kuch sath me hi to kiya tha. DramEve-1 ki practice (performance to mai nahi de paaya, because you-know-why lol, but tereko Aaasman Gir Raha Hai me dekhne ko mila, wahin pe mazaa aa gaya. Odyssey me bc nagarpalika ka video banaya jisme mai chupchap muth maar raha aur tu aa gaya "maaa ka bhosda mc karke". Phir bc Antaragni me gadde uthaye. Pura Hall-13 bhar diya, phir bhi dhang ki team nahi mili  (N***t ka mkb). Aur Galaxy LOLOLOL. Galaxy ke to itne kisse hai bc, shuru hi kahaan karunga. Kitne baar gaye bhai Ramayya. Aur Saini ke saath bhi us raat jo khaane gaye the bahar, yaad hai wo ? BC accounts sunake confuse kar rahe the mujhe raat bhar. Election me tu highest margin se jeeta tha (campaigner mai tha bsdk, bhuliyo mat). Aur phir uski party, as usual, Ramayya me.
Phir aaya second year. Tu bana cult secy. Saath me Antaragni kiya. Ab wo to alag story hai, par majaa to aaya. Pura aatankwadi ban gaya play me. Wahi play bc Rendezvous, Antaragni aur Inter-IIT chalaya. Aur phir Galaxy ! Maine jitni gaaliyaan char saal me nahi sune, utne tu Adhip se sirf nukkad ko leke sunn gaya. Mujhe abhi bhi yaad hai tu teesre scene me bilkul sexily nikla tha, par Benny dholak baja gaya, aur tera katt gaya XDDDD
Bhai ab bata mai in sab baaton ko kaise expand karun ? Itna kuch kiye hai saath me bc. Ek baar to maal bhi phunkwaya. BC video bana lena tha, jab IAS banega to leak kar dunga. (Video leak se baat yaad aayi, bsdk wo first year wali video delete kar di na ? MC). IAS ban jaldi bsdk, phir treat diyo. Ramayya hi chalte hain iss baar bhi.
author: Alan  Nair

text:
bhai !!!
pehle to thanks. Mai second year me roz nashe yehi jaanke karta tha ki CS220 ka lab to tu hi sambhaal lega, mai kyu tension lu.
Har course me saath the... Aur sab me kaam tujhse hi karwaya. 
First year me bhai, second year me roomies, third year me adjacent roomies. Fourth year me virtual roomies maan lo. Bas ek guzaarish hai, aage bhi aise hi kareeb rehna.
author: Alan  Nair

text:
Na bhai, aisa kaise chalega. Bio edit kar. aur joke daal.
You are BY FAR the funniest guy I've ever seen, but that is just one colour on your canvas. You are genuinely someone I beheld with awe and respect and there are very few people like that. There's so much I want to write but I have so little space and so limited a vocabulary.
You are the Jamal to my Fazlu.
The water in my flow.
The dholak in my medley.

TLDR: Your personality got more flavour than the food you eat.
author: Alan  Nair

text:
You are the sexiest guy in Y17 (I say this strictly in a heterosexual way).
Tumse milne se pehle bhi bahut sunn rakhi thi tumhare baare me. First Year Hall Elections ke time Chitral vagarah discuss kar rahe the ki kaise first year votes gather karein, to maine suna "A5/A6 me to Yadu ka raaj chalta hai, pehle usko manao". Mere mann mai bahut gehra impression chadh gaya ye sunnke.
Phir bc tu Galaxy nukkad ke practice me aaya. Tab bc samjha tu duniya ka sabse chill launda hai. Presi to banana hi tha. Aur bc Y18 HEC election me aisa chod kar dala, kitne kaand hue.
Fourth year me sirf 2 maheene hi bita paaye saath me, par un do maheenon me tere andar ka party animal jaag gaya. Aur uss raat (April 2, 2021, Hall 5), tune jo 1 ghante ki essay sunai, pedon ke baare me, wo yaad hai ? Mujhe yaad hai lol.
Agle saal, campus khulne ke baad, aa jaio zarur. "Ghumne".
author: Alan  Nair
